channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Docker Desktop Accelerates Innovation with Faster Release Cadence
item.description: We're excited to announce a major evolution in how we deliver Docker Desktop updates to you. Starting with Docker Desktop release 4.45.0 on 28 August we're moving to releases every two weeks, with the goal of reaching weekly releases by the end of 2025. Why We're Making This Change You've told us you want faster... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-desktop-updates-every-two-weeks/

item.title: Prototyping an AI Tutor with Docker Model Runner
item.description: Every developer remembers their first docker run hello-world. The mix of excitement and wonder as that simple command pulls an image, creates a container, and displays a friendly message. But what if AI could make that experience even better? As a technical writer on Dockerâ€™s Docs team, I spend my days thinking about developer experience.... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/how-to-build-an-ai-tutor-with-model-runner/
